name: Guess My Number
desc: "Guess My Number!" is a simple and interactive web-based game where players attempt to guess a randomly generated number between 1 and 20, with hints provided to guide their guesses.

name: Pig Game
desc: Pig Game is a fun, turn-based dice game where players compete to reach 100 points first. Roll the dice, hold your score, and avoid rolling a 1!

name: Budgety
desc: Budgety is a budget management app that helps you track income and expenses, providing a clear financial overview for informed decision-making.

name: Bankist App
desc: A modern banking application with features like money transfers, loan requests, account management, and more.

name: Bankist Domain
desc: Bankist Domain is a modern bank website showcasing smooth scrolling, lazy loading, carousels, and responsive design.

name: Mapty
desc: Mapty is a workout app to track running and cycling workouts on a map. It features a modern, responsive interface and uses local storage for data persistence.

name: Forkify
desc: Forkify is a recipe search engine with a modern UI, allowing users to find, save, and create recipes easily.

name: Our Farm
desc: Our Farm API is a Node.js-based API designed to support the "Our Farm" shopping site, providing endpoints for retrieving detailed information about fresh goods such as vegetables and cheese.

name: Get Movie Recommendations
desc: Get Movie Recommendations is a responsive movie search engine that allows users to search by name, year, and type with real-time results.

name: Clean Weather Client
desc: A sleek and modern weather search engine providing a 5-day forecast for any location with an interactive map and responsive design.

name: Cashier Client
desc: Cashier Client is a store management software offering secure user authentication, role-based access, product management, and feedback handling.

name: Todo App
desc: A responsive task management app using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features task creation, editing, deletion, and filtering.

name: Natours
desc: Full-stack application designed for tour management, featuring a RESTful API and server-rendered pages. The app is fully optimized, allowing users to explore, book, and manage tours with a seamless experience.

name: Studybud
desc: A responsive forum for programmers to discuss topics, manage rooms, exchange messages, and view user profiles, built with Django, SQLite, and DRF.

name: Chat Verse
desc: Chat Verse is a Discord replica for organizing servers, channels, and conversations with text, voice, and video communication.

name: Teva Naot
desc: Teva Naot Better Clone aims to modernize the e-commerce experience for the Israeli shoe brand Teva Naot

name: A Vending Machine
desc: AVendingMachine is a modern web app showcasing vending machines with a responsive design, real-time data, and interactive UI.
